name: Victorian Nemesis
description:
A game about social climbing made for the Nemesis Jam. Features Victorian silliness as you maneuver your way through events and become the wealthiest socialite.

The fancier the event, the more money is on the line to win or lose. Your skills will help you win by a wider margin, but failing an event will increase your skills. Manage your risks to level up and outclass NPCs without going bankrupt yourself.
